epics_detail.title: User Management System
epics_detail.description: Complete user registration, authentication, and profile management

stories.title: User Registration
stories.description: As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can access the platform
stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Registration form with validation
2. Email verification
3. Password strength requirements

tasks.title: Design registration form UI
tasks.description: Create responsive registration form with validation

tasks.title: Implement backend registration endpoint
tasks.description: Create API endpoint for user registration
